Key Match Events: Torres drove in Anthony Volpe on a two on, two out single
Giancarlo Stanton drove a ball 117 miles per hour into center field
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said after the game: 'Everyone is feeling pretty good about their teams. Thatâ€™s the case for me.'

Gerrit Cole was thrilled in his ability to rise to the occasion and help his team clinch a spot in the ALCS: 'It means a lot. It was a big game. It was a fun game. It was a great battle. Just a great battle. Fun to be part of.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees are going back to the American League Championship Series. In Game 4 of the ALDS, New York defeated the Kansas City Royals 3-1, to take the series 3-games-to-1, and clinch their second ALCS appearance in the last three years.
Others: The losing pitcher for the Royals was Michael Wacha
Luke Weaver recorded his third save of the playoffs
